newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Repco said to have stake in MBF Capital.
newsitem.headline: Repco said to have stake in MBF Capital.

text.p: Timber and gaming concern Repco Holdings Bhd is rumoured to have purchased a 20 percent stake in financial services firm MBF Capital Bhd, equity dealers said on Tuesday.
"The rumour is that Repco has a 20 percent stake in MBF Capital," said a dealer with a foreign brokerage firm. Shares of both companies have been suspended pending news announcements.
MBF Capital stock closed at 5.20 ringgit on June 6, while Repco closed at 128.50 ringgit on Monday.

A spokesman for MBF Capital was not immediately available for comment, while a Repco official declined to comment on the rumour, but said, "the announcement has nothing to do with the rumour, it is a separate matter".
Separately, Sabah-based Suria Capital Bhd said on Monday it is seeking permission from Malaysian regulators to begin negotiations for a possible merger.
